column1: Los Palacios (Spanish pronunciation: [los paˈlasjos]) is a municipality and town in the Pinar del Río Province of Cuba. It was founded in 1760.
The municipality is divided into the barrios of Limones
column6: Sierra and Urbano.Los Palacios Municipal Museum is located in the 21st street.

column2: the municipality of Los Palacios had a population of 38
column3: 950. With a total area of 786 km2 (303 sq mi)
column4: it has a population density of 49.6/km2 (128/sq mi).
